TopicTitle: Hello world! I come in peace.

Articles.Content:
Hi everyone! I think it might be good to introduce myself.
I have been playing KSP for a long time, since the release of 0.21 and sure I have been reading this forum (only to find answers to specific questions) and KSP Wiki, but I decided to join the community only now. The story is quite short: I experienced several problems with mods and their compatibility, decided to ask help\submit a bug report to their creators, but after I created an account here I somehow managed to deal with this problems by myself. Then I looked around, read a lot of KSP-community threads just for fun and decided to stay here because this forum is... you know, nice, friendly, sometimes funny and so on.
Hi!  It's great to see that you're adding your voice to the community.  I'm a new KSP player (a button-masher, really...), but I too find the KSP community rather great.  Cheers!

Hello BoPET and welcome to the forum!

I'm always pleased to welcome a lurker into the community.

Happy landings!
